#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
    while(t--)
    {
     char ar[52];
     scanf("%s",ar);
     getchar();
     
     int n,flag=0;
     
     for(n=0;ar[n]!='\0';n++);
     //cout<<n;
     
     for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
     {
        if((ar[i]=='2')||(ar[i]=='3')||(ar[i]=='4')||(ar[i]=='5')
        ||(ar[i]=='7'))     
        {printf("NO\n");
         flag=1;
         break;}
     }           
       
       
        if(flag==0)
        {
         printf("YES\n");
         for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
         {
          if(int(ar[i]-'0')==0) 
          printf("0");
        
          else if(int(ar[i]-'0')==1) 
          printf("1");
        
          else if(int(ar[i]-'0')==6) 
          printf("9");
        
          else if(int(ar[i]-'0')==8) 
          printf("8");
        
          else if(int(ar[i]-'0')==9) 
          printf("6");
         }
         printf("\n");
       } 
    }
   // getch();
}
